page.title: 16 North Hull Estate
page.content: North Hull Eatate is quite a large estate - many thousands of people live here. There are many houses, flats and bungalows. Most people live in terraced houses, some live in semi- detached houses and a few live in detached houses. Most of the houses have brick walls and slate roofs but there are different designs. There are some prefabs, which were built just after the second world war as temporary houses but they are still in use today, about 40 years later. There are Groves, Closes, Avenues, Roads and Streets. The avenue names are often numbers like 5th Avenue. Some groves and closes just have old people living in them. The bungalows are very convenient for the old people. Very few houses have garages because not many people had cars when the estate was built.
